name: Saunak

services.title: Website Development
services.description: As an expert in web development, I specialize in creating visually captivating websites that engage and convert. Let me bring your online advertising ideas to life with seamless user experiences and innovative design.

services.title: Website Design
services.description: I build and optimize your online presence. Your website serves as the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: Web Developer
services.description: I combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualizations that bring your project to life on the web.

aboutpara: As a web developer, I am not only well-versed in the MERN stack and proficient in NoSQL databases, but I am also an active open source contributor. I believe in the power of collaboration and giving back to the developer community.Being an open source contributor allows me to learn from other talented developers, share my knowledge, and contribute to projects that make a positive impact in the tech world. It also keeps me updated with the latest trends and best practices in web development, which I bring to the table when working on your projects.By leveraging my open source experience, I can ensure that the solutions I build for you are not only innovative but also built on a solid foundation of industry-approved practices. So, rest assured that your projects will benefit from the expertise gained through my contributions to the open source community. Let's work together to create remarkable web applications that leave a mark on the digital landscape!

experiences.bullets: Collaborated with the development team in designing,developing and testing web applications,fostering teamwork and creativity , Worked with the team to develop and maintain the company's website
